Reviews.Title: I like anything that has no extra moving parts
Reviews.Author: JnzWorld
Reviews.Content: I like anything that has no extra moving parts and a DVR is the way to go! This one was fairly easy to hook up but too complicated for my non-computerized dad. Seller was great tho!

Reviews.Title: Great for watching cameras
Reviews.Author: Benton
Reviews.Content: This is great if all you want to do is watch cameras.  The hard drive has not worked from day one. I contacted them  through amazon and they wanted me to call them to troubleshoot. I call and put on hold and dropped. They want me to provide them my phone and wait for them to call. I don't have time to wait.  Send a product that works as advertised. I give one star because you can watch the cameras.
